com.company.Combat
Class CombatScene

java.lang.Object
  com.company.Combat.CombatScene

public class CombatScene
extends java.lang.Object

The Combat Scene controls combat between the character and a monster.

When an instance of combat is created, the scene will be loaded, and the properties of the monster will be adjusted according to the characters level.

After instantiating this class you must call fight() to enter combat, and render the scene.

Constructor Summary
CombatScene(Character character, Monster monster)
          Designated Constructor for creating an CombatScene with a character and an opponent monster.
 
Method Summary
 boolean fight()
          Start the fight.

Constructor Detail

CombatScene

public CombatScene(Character character,
                   Monster monster)
Designated Constructor for creating an CombatScene with a character and an opponent monster.

Parameters:
character - The instance of the players character.
monster - The instance of the enemy monster to fight against.
Method Detail

fight

public boolean fight()
Start the fight.

This enters combat, renders the scene and handles each participants turn based on user input. A fight will go on until one of the participants dies.

Returns:
True if character wins the fight i.e. the monster dies, or false if character dies.
